changeSet.author: tumijacob
changeSet.comment: This change set migrates the PreferredLanguage table from an integer id primary key to a UUID of type BINARY(16).
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE PreferredLanguage ADD id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER id;

ALTER TABLE Donor_AUD ADD preferredLanguage_id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(preferredLanguage_id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(preferredLanguage_id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(preferredLanguage_id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(preferredLanguage_id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(preferredLanguage_id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER preferredLanguage_id;

ALTER TABLE Donor ADD preferredLanguage_id_text varchar(36) GENERATED ALWAYS AS (LCASE(CONCAT_WS('-', HEX(SUBSTR(preferredLanguage_id, 1, 4)), HEX(SUBSTR(preferredLanguage_id, 5, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(preferredLanguage_id, 7, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(preferredLanguage_id, 9, 2)), HEX(SUBSTR(preferredLanguage_id, 11)) ))) VIRTUAL AFTER preferredLanguage_id;

UPDATE Donor AS updateTable LEFT JOIN PreferredLanguage AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.preferredLanguage_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.preferredLanguage_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;

UPDATE Donor_AUD AS updateTable LEFT JOIN PreferredLanguage AS joinedTable ON (updateTable.preferredLanguage_id_temp = joinedTable.id_temp) SET updateTable.preferredLanguage_id = joinedTable.id WHERE joinedTable.id IS NOT null;
